title: Do any of you get this little message
body: I cant sign in to PBE and i keep getting this message, what do i do?

replies.body: It looks like you might be using the wrong URL to get to the PBE age.  Your account is EUW, but you're using the NA link.  :D  Try this [EUW PBE ](https://pbesignup.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe)link and let me know if it helps- but make sure to login too!  Let me know if it works.
